entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:37 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 03:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
Temperature: -1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow at times heavy beginning late this evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
